name: patch-companies-companyId-users-userId
description:
Updates user details for the `userId` and the `companyId` identified in the path.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”Users read and write

companyId.description: The unique identifier of the company account.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

accountGroups.description: The list of [account groups](https://docs.adyen.com/account/account-structure#account-groups) associated with this user.

active.description: Indicates whether this user is active.

associatedMerchantAccounts.description: The list of [merchant accounts](https://docs.adyen.com/account/account-structure#merchant-accounts) to associate the user with.

email.description: The email address of the user.

roles.description: The list of [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/account/user-roles) for this user.

timeZoneCode.description: The [tz database name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) of the time zone of the user. For example, **Europe/Amsterdam**.

**self**

**timeZoneCode**: The [tz database name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) of the time zone of the user. For example, **Europe/Amsterdam**.
**username**: The username for this user.
